generator.group: Turner Institute for Brain and Mental Health, School of Psychological Sciences, Monash University

contact.group: Turner Institute for Brain and Mental Health, School of Psychological Sciences, Monash University

publications.title: Generation of induced pluripotent stem cell lines from three individuals with autism spectrum disorder

genomic_characterisation.summary: Molecular karyotyping of the reprogrammed line by the VCGS revealed the expected karyotype without aneuploidy. Comparative analyses between array data from the iPSCs and their respective parental PBMC lines demonstrated 99.99% concordance, authenticating identity.

induced_derivation.non_int_vector_name: Episomal vector-based reprogramming (OCT4, SOX2, KLF4, MYC)

ethics.institutional_HREC: Monash University Human Research Ethics Committee (MUHREC)
